coreAttributes.name: Royal Knight Greave
coreAttributes.description: A pair of arcane constructed steel thigh-high Greaves based of the appearance of a legendary King, with the heel being raised off the ground in order to make the wearer taller, as well as to accentuate their calf muscles and the overall length of their legs.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] [npc.her] [npc.feet] into the greaves and [npc.verb(pull)] them up to [npc.her] mid-thigh.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the greaves and [npc.verb(pull)] them up to [npc2.her] mid-thigh.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(push)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the greaves and [npc.verb(yank)] them up to [npc2.her] mid-thigh.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the tops of [npc.her] thigh-high greaves before tugging them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the tops of [npc2.namePos] thigh-high greaves before tugging them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] down the tops of [npc2.namePos] thigh-high greaves before tugging them off.
